olapUnit.name: Foodmart_sample
olapUnit.label: Foodmart Sample Analysis View
olapUnit.description: Sample Analysis View: Foodmart Unit Sales
olapUnit.mdxQuery: select {[Measures].[Unit Sales], [Measures].[Store Cost], [Measures].[Store Sales]} on columns, {([Promotion Media].[All Media], [Product].[All Products])} ON rows from Sales
